16 from niryo_robot_vision.enums import ObjectType, ColorHSV
17 from niryo_robot_vision.image_functions import debug_threshold_color, debug_markers
18 from niryo_robot_vision.math_functions import euclidean_3d_dist, calculate_barycenter
19 from niryo_robot_vision.visualization_functions import *
20 from niryo_robot_vision.CalibrationObject import CalibrationObject
21 from ObjectDetector import ObjectDetector
22 from fonctions_camera import generate_msg_from_image
23 from VideoStream import WebcamStream, GazeboStream
24 from tf.transformations import quaternion_from_matrix

26 # Messages
27 from visualization_msgs.msg import Marker, MarkerArray
28 from sensor_msgs.msg import CameraInfo, CompressedImage
29 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
30 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
31 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import ObjectPose
32 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.srv import GetWorkspaceMatrixPoses, GetWorkspacePoints, GetWorkspaceRatio

34 # Services
35 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import DebugColorDetection
36 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import DebugMarkers
37 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import ObjDetection
38 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import TakePicture
39 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import Visualization

41 
42 class VisionNode:
43  """
44  Object which will contains all ROS Publishers & Services relate to image processing
45  """
46 
47  def __init__(self):
48  rospy.logdebug("Vision Node - Entering in Init")
49  # -- ROS
50  self.__path_package = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('niryo_robot_vision')
51  self.__simulation_mode = rospy.get_param("~simulation_mode")
52  self.__debug_compression_quality = rospy.get_param("~debug_compression_quality")
53 
54  rospy.logdebug("VisionNode.init - debug_compression_quality: {}".format(self.__debug_compression_quality))
55 
56  # PUBLISHERS
57  self.__publisher_compressed_stream = rospy.Publisher('~compressed_video_stream', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
58  self.__publisher_rviz = rospy.Publisher('~visualization_marker', MarkerArray, queue_size=10, latch=True)
59 
60  # OBJECT DETECTION
61  rospy.Service('~obj_detection_rel', ObjDetection, self.__callback_get_obj_relative_pose)
62 
63  # CALIBRATION
64  if not self.__simulation_mode:
65  self.__calibration_object = self.__generate_calib_object_from_setup()
66  else:
67  self.__calibration_object = self.__generate_calib_object_from_gazebo_topic()
68 
69  self.__camera_intrinsics_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~camera_intrinsics', CameraInfo, latch=True, queue_size=1)
70  self.publish_camera_intrinsics()
71  rospy.logdebug("Vision Node - Camera Intrinsics published !")
72 
73  # Debug features
74  rospy.Service('~take_picture', TakePicture, self.__callback_take_picture)
75  rospy.Service('~debug_markers', DebugMarkers, self.__callback_debug_markers)
76  rospy.Service('~debug_colors', DebugColorDetection, self.__callback_debug_color)
77  rospy.Service('~visualization', Visualization, self.__callback_visualization)
78 
79  self.__visualization_workspace = None
80  self.__time_add_object = rospy.Time.now()
81 
82  # -- VIDEO STREAM
83  rospy.logdebug("Vision Node - Creating Video Stream object")
84  cls_ = GazeboStream if self.__simulation_mode else WebcamStream
85  self.__video_stream = cls_(self.__calibration_object,
86  self.__publisher_compressed_stream,
87  rospy.get_param("~flip_img"))
88  rospy.logdebug("Vision Node - Video Stream Created")
89 
90  self.__video_stream.start()
91 
92  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
93  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
94 
95  rospy.loginfo("Vision Node - Initialized")
96 
97  def __generate_calib_object_from_setup(self):
98  calibration_object_name = rospy.get_param("~obj_calib_name")
99  rospy.logdebug("VisionNode.init - obj_calib_name: {}".format(calibration_object_name))
100 
101  path_yaml = os.path.join(self.__path_package, "config/{}.yaml".format(calibration_object_name))
102  if not os.path.isfile(path_yaml):
103  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - Intrinsics file '{}' does not exist".format(calibration_object_name))
104  return CalibrationObject.set_empty()
105  with open(path_yaml, "r") as input_file:
106  yaml_file = yaml.safe_load(input_file)
107  return CalibrationObject.set_from_yaml(yaml_file)
108 
109  @staticmethod
110  def __generate_calib_object_from_gazebo_topic():
111  camera_info_message = rospy.wait_for_message("/gazebo_camera/camera_info", CameraInfo)
112  mtx = np.reshape(camera_info_message.K, (3, 3))
113  dist = np.expand_dims(camera_info_message.D, axis=0)
114  return CalibrationObject.set_from_values(mtx, dist)
115 
116  def publish_camera_intrinsics(self):
117  mtx, dist = self.__calibration_object.get_camera_info()
118 
119  msg_camera_info = CameraInfo()
120  msg_camera_info.K = list(mtx.flatten())
121  msg_camera_info.D = list(dist.flatten())
122  return self.__camera_intrinsics_publisher.publish(msg_camera_info)
123 
124  # - CALLBACK
125  def __callback_get_obj_relative_pose(self, req):
126  # Reading last image
127  img = self.__video_stream.read_undistorted()
128  if img is None:
129  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - Try to get object relative pose while stream is not running !")
130  return CommandStatus.VIDEO_STREAM_NOT_RUNNING, ObjectPose(), "", "", CompressedImage()
131 
132  # Extracting parameters from request
133  obj_type = ObjectType[req.obj_type]
134  obj_color = ColorHSV[req.obj_color]
135  workspace_ratio = req.workspace_ratio
136  self.__object_detector = ObjectDetector(
137  obj_type=obj_type,
138  obj_color=obj_color,
139  workspace_ratio=workspace_ratio,
140  ret_image_bool=req.ret_image,
141  )
142 
143  # Launching pipeline
144  status, msg_res_pos, obj_type, obj_color, im_draw = self.__object_detector.extract_object_with_hsv(img)
145  if self.__object_detector.should_ret_image():
146  _, msg_img = generate_msg_from_image(im_draw, compression_quality=self.__debug_compression_quality)
147  else:
148  msg_img = CompressedImage()
149  return status, msg_res_pos, obj_type, obj_color, msg_img
150 
151  def __callback_take_picture(self, req):
152  path = os.path.expanduser(req.path)
153  if not os.path.isdir(path):
154  os.makedirs(path)
155  time_string = time.strftime("%Y%m%d-%H%M%S")
156 
157  img_full_path = "{}.jpg".format(os.path.join(path, time_string))
158  im = self.__video_stream.read_raw_img()
159  res_bool = cv2.imwrite(img_full_path, im)
160 
161  if res_bool:
162  rospy.logdebug("Vision Node - Picture taken & saved")
163  else:
164  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - Cannot save picture")
165 
166  return res_bool
167 
168  def __callback_debug_markers(self, _):
169  img = self.__video_stream.read_undistorted()
170  if img is None:
171  message = 'Try to get debug markers while stream is not running !'
172  rospy.logwarn_throttle(2.0, f'Vision Node - {message}')
173  return CommandStatus.VIDEO_STREAM_NOT_RUNNING, message, False, CompressedImage()
174 
175  markers_detected, img_res = debug_markers(img)
176  _, msg_img = generate_msg_from_image(img_res, compression_quality=self.__debug_compression_quality)
177 
178  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully got debug markers', markers_detected, msg_img
179 
180  def __callback_debug_color(self, req):
181  img = self.__video_stream.read_undistorted()
182  if img is None:
183  message = 'Try to get debug colors while stream is not running !'
184  rospy.logwarn_throttle(2.0, f'Vision Node - {message}')
185  return CommandStatus.VIDEO_STREAM_NOT_RUNNING, message, CompressedImage()
186  color = ColorHSV[req.color]
187  img_res = debug_threshold_color(img, color)
188  _, msg_img = generate_msg_from_image(img_res, compression_quality=self.__debug_compression_quality)
189 
190  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully got debug colors', msg_img
191 
192  def __callback_visualization(self, req):
193  if req.clearing:
194  marker = create_clear_all_marker(rospy.Time.now())
195  self.__publisher_rviz.publish([marker])
196  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully cleared markers'
197  else:
198  # Get workspace matrix
199  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_matrix_poses')
200  try:
201  get_matrix = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_matrix_poses',
202  GetWorkspaceMatrixPoses)
203  response = get_matrix(req.workspace)
204 
205  position_matrix = np.empty(shape=[0, 3])
206  for elem in response.matrix_position:
207  position_matrix = np.append(position_matrix, [[elem.x, elem.y, elem.z]], axis=0)
208  rotation_matrix = np.empty(shape=[0, 4])
209  for elem in response.matrix_orientation:
210  rotation_matrix = np.append(rotation_matrix, [[elem.x, elem.y, elem.z, elem.w]], axis=0)
211  workspace = {
212  "name": req.workspace, "matrix_position": position_matrix, "matrix_rotation": rotation_matrix
213  }
214  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
215  workspace = None
216  rospy.logerr(f'Vision Node - get workspace matrix failed: {e}')
217 
218  # Get workspace ratio
219  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_ratio')
220  try:
221  get_ratio = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_ratio', GetWorkspaceRatio)
222  response = get_ratio(req.workspace)
223 
224  workspace["ratio"] = response.ratio
225  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
226  workspace = None
227  rospy.logerr(f'Vision Node - get workspace ratio failed: {e}')
228 
229  # Publish marker's workspace
230  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_points')
231  try:
232  get_points = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/get_workspace_points', GetWorkspacePoints)
233  response = get_points(req.workspace)
234 
235  index = 1
236  time_workspace = rospy.Time.now()
237  list_marker = []
238  for point in response.points:
239  list_marker.append(
240  create_marker_rviz([point.x, point.y, point.z], [0, 0, 0, 1], index, time_workspace))
241  list_marker.append(
242  create_text_marker(4 + index,
243  str(index),
244  time_workspace, [point.x, point.y, point.z], [0, 0, 0, 1],
245  0.035))
246  index += 1
247 
248  # Title workspace
249  middle_text = Point((response.points[0].x + response.points[1].x) / 2,
250  (response.points[0].y + response.points[1].y) / 2,
251  (response.points[0].z + response.points[1].z) / 2)
252 
253  list_marker.append(
254  create_text_marker(9,
255  str(workspace["name"]),
256  time_workspace, [middle_text.x, middle_text.y, middle_text.z], [0, 0, 0, 1],
257  0.035))
258 
259  self.__publisher_rviz.publish(list_marker)
260 
261  # Publish workspace plane
262  bary_center = calculate_barycenter(response.points)
263  sizeX = euclidean_3d_dist(response.points[0], response.points[1]) + 0.03
264  sizeY = euclidean_3d_dist(response.points[1], response.points[2]) + 0.03
265 
266  quaternion = quaternion_from_matrix(workspace["matrix_rotation"])
267  marker = create_workspace(10,
268  time_workspace, [bary_center.x, bary_center.y, bary_center.z],
269  quaternion,
270  sizeX,
271  sizeY,
272  0.0005)
273  self.__publisher_rviz.publish([marker])
274 
275  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
276  rospy.logerr(f'Vision Node - Publishing marker\'s workspace failed: {e}')
277 
278  # Reading last image
279  img = self.__video_stream.read_undistorted()
280  if img is None:
281  message = 'Try to get object relative pose while stream is not running !'
282  rospy.logwarn(f'Vision Node - {message}')
283  return CommandStatus.VIDEO_STREAM_NOT_RUNNING, message
284 
285  # Detect object
286  index = 11
287  index_max = 50
288  obj_type = ObjectType["ANY"]
289  obj_color = ColorHSV["ANY"]
290  workspace_ratio = workspace["ratio"]
291  self.__object_detector = ObjectDetector(
292  obj_type=obj_type,
293  obj_color=obj_color,
294  workspace_ratio=workspace_ratio,
295  ret_image_bool=False,
296  )
297  # Launching pipeline
298  status, cx_list, cy_list, list_size, angle_list, color_list, \
299  object_type_list = self.__object_detector.extract_all_object_with_hsv(img, workspace)
300 
301  time_object = rospy.Time.now()
302  if workspace and status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
303  self.__time_add_object = time_object
304  for cx, cy, size, angle, obj_color, obj_type in zip(cx_list, cy_list, list_size, angle_list, color_list,
305  object_type_list):
306  position, orientation = get_pose(workspace, cx, cy, angle)
307  publish_object_rviz(position,
308  orientation,
309  size,
310  obj_type,
311  obj_color,
312  index,
313  self.__publisher_rviz,
314  time_object,
315  rospy.Duration.from_sec(3))
316 
317  if index < index_max:
318  index += 1
319 
320  # Clearing
321  list_clear_marker = []
322  for i in range(index, index_max + 1):
323  list_clear_marker.append(create_clear_marker(i, time_object))
324  self.__publisher_rviz.publish(list_clear_marker)
325 
326  else:
327  if self.__time_add_object + rospy.Duration(3) < rospy.Time.now():
328  # Reset
329  list_clear_marker = []
330  for i in range(index, index_max + 1):
331  list_clear_marker.append(create_clear_marker(i, time_object))
332  self.__publisher_rviz.publish(list_clear_marker)
333 
334  return status, ''
335 
336 
337 if __name__ == '__main__':
338  sentry_init()
339 
340  # we need to layun
341  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_vision', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
342 
343  # change logger level according to node parameter
344  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
345  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
346  logger.setLevel(log_level)
347 
348  try:
349  vision_node = VisionNode()
350  rospy.spin()
351  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
352  pass
